description: Class number of binary quadratic forms with fundamental discriminant A003658(n),n>=2.
references: D. A. Buell, Binary Quadratic Forms. Springer-Verlag, NY, 1989, pp. 236, 241.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Wolfdieter Lang, Table for a(n), n=2, ..., 92 (see Part 2).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
